title: One Week Left
author: VD
content_html:
There are seven days left for the Hypergamouse campaign, so we’re into the final stretch run for your chance to obtain Hypergamouse, Sigma Game, or, if you prefer, both.

In obviously related news, there is a new episode of HYPERGAMOUSE on Arktoons today.

DISCUSS ON SG
